modShortDescription: This mod adds an extra input slot to the forge and moves the UI around a little so there's no window overlap.
modDescription:
This mod adds an extra input [slot](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-more-slots/) to the forge and moves the UI around a little so thereâ€™s no window overlap.
